trans-unit.source: Printing and Reporting (Visual Basic) | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: Impression et création de rapports (Visual Basic) | Documents Microsoft
Impression et création de rapports (Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] offers several options for printing and reporting.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)]offre plusieurs options d’impression et de création de rapports.

trans-unit.source: The following topics provide overviews and links to the relevant documentation related to printing and reporting.
trans-unit.target: Les rubriques suivantes fournissent une vue d’ensemble et des liens vers la documentation relative à l’impression et création de rapports.

trans-unit.source: Provides an overview of the `PrintForm` component that enables printing the contents of a form.
trans-unit.target: Fournit une vue d’ensemble de le `PrintForm` composant qui permet d’imprimer le contenu d’un formulaire.
[Guide pratique : imprimer un formulaire à défilement variable](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/printing/how-to-print-a-scrollable-form.md)

trans-unit.source: Explains how to print a scrollable form by using the `PrintForm` component.
trans-unit.target: Explique comment imprimer un formulaire à défilement variable à l’aide de la `PrintForm` composant.

trans-unit.source: [How to: Print Client and Non-Client Areas of a Form](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/printing/how-to-print-client-and-non-client-areas-of-a-form.md)
trans-unit.target: [Guide pratique : imprimer des zones clientes et non clientes d’un formulaire](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/printing/how-to-print-client-and-non-client-areas-of-a-form.md)

trans-unit.source: Explains how to print both the client and non-client areas of a form by using the `PrintForm` component.
trans-unit.target: Explique comment imprimer des zones le client et non clientes d’un formulaire à l’aide de la `PrintForm` composant.

trans-unit.source: [How to: Print the Client Area of a Form](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/printing/how-to-print-the-client-area-of-a-form.md)
trans-unit.target: [Guide pratique : imprimer la zone cliente d’un formulaire](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/printing/how-to-print-the-client-area-of-a-form.md)

trans-unit.source: Explains how to print the client area of a form by using the `PrintForm` component.
trans-unit.target: Explique comment imprimer la zone cliente d’un formulaire à l’aide de la `PrintForm` composant.

trans-unit.source: [How to: Print a Form by Using the PrintForm Component](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/printing/how-to-print-a-form-by-using-the-printform-component.md)
trans-unit.target: [Guide pratique : imprimer un formulaire à l’aide du composant PrintForm](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/printing/how-to-print-a-form-by-using-the-printform-component.md)

trans-unit.source: Explains how to print a basic form by using the `PrintForm` component.
trans-unit.target: Explique comment imprimer un formulaire de base à l’aide de la `PrintForm` composant.

trans-unit.source: Discusses how to deploy the `PrintForm` component together with an application.
trans-unit.target: Explique comment déployer le `PrintForm` composant avec une application.
[Ajout de rapports affichables aux applications Visual Studio](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/printing/adding-printable-reports-to-visual-studio-applications.md)

trans-unit.source: Discusses options available for writing reports.
trans-unit.target: Présente les options disponibles pour l’écriture de rapports.
